document_data.name: Goblin Berserker Lodge
document_data.mainbody: The '''Goblin Berserker Lodge''' was the base of operations for the [[Goblin lodge|Goblin Berserkers]] found in the capital city of [[Immilmar]] in [[Rashemen]] in the {{YearlinkName|1367}}.{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Location: The lodge was located on the north side of the city.
document_data.Description: The longhouse's small stature, especially when compared with the nearby [[Owlbear Berserker Lodge]], accurately reflected the quantity of Goblin berskers.
